verbose_text: To determine whether glucose stimulated insulin secretion in betaLamtor1-KO mice was enhanced by increasing glutamate production, the 13 C enrichment of glutamate was measured in whole cells and the cytosol of islet cells with or without aminooxyacetate [AOA, an inhibitor of the malate-aspartate shuttle] treatment, while stimulating with [U- 13 C]-glucose (XREF_FIG).
